  • Constructor Details

    • ViewMakePost

      private ViewMakePost()

      Method: ViewMakePost()

      Description: This method initializes all the elements of the graphical user interface. This method determines the location, size, font, color, and change and event handlers for each GUI object.

      This is a singleton and is only performed once. Subsequent uses fill in the changeable fields using the displayMakePost method.

  • Method Details

    • displayMakePost

      public static void displayMakePost(javafx.stage.Stage ps, User user)

      Method: displayMakePost(Stage ps, User user)

      Description: This method is the single entry point from outside this package to cause the Make Post page to be displayed.

      Parameters:
      ps - specifies the JavaFX Stage to be used for this GUI and it's methods
      user - specifies the User for this GUI and it's methods

    • setupLabelUI

      private static void setupLabelUI(javafx.scene.control.Label l, String ff, double f, double w, javafx.geometry.Pos p, double x, double y)
      Private local method to initialize the standard fields for a label
      Parameters:
      l - The Label object to be initialized
      ff - The font family to be used
      f - The size of the font
      w - The minimum width of the label
      p - The alignment (e.g., left, center, right)
      x - The X-coordinate position
      y - The Y-coordinate position

      private void setupTextUI(javafx.scene.control.TextField t, String ff, double f, double w, javafx.geometry.Pos p, double x, double y, boolean e)
      Private local method to initialize the standard fields for a text field
      Parameters:
      t - The TextField object to be initialized
      ff - The font family to be used
      f - The size of the font
      w - The width of the TextField
      p - The alignment (e.g., left, center, right)
      x - The X-coordinate position
      y - The Y-coordinate position
      e - Whether the TextField is editable

    • setupTextAreaUI

      private void setupTextAreaUI(javafx.scene.control.TextArea t, String ff, double f, double w, double h, javafx.geometry.Pos p, double x, double y, boolean e)
      Private local method to initialize the standard fields for a text area
      Parameters:
      t - The TextArea object to be initialized
      ff - The font family to be used
      f - The size of the font
      w - The width of the TextArea
      h - The height of the TextArea
      p - The alignment (VBox alignment for containing layout)
      x - The X-coordinate position
      y - The Y-coordinate position
      e - Whether the TextArea is editable
